name: Light of Mine
description: Light of Mine will leave your head spinning in terror. Experience 360 degrees of VR terror as you use your candle to explore an ancient temple with danger lurking in the darkness. Light of Mine is made by nonPareil Studios. We are a studio that provides better futures for adults on the autism spectrum.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports. Optimized for HTC Vive
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports Optimized for HTC Vive
